module, composition, whole-part, individual, activity, process plant
This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to record a whole-part relationship between individual activities.
The nature of a whole-part relationship between individual activities may be specified by indicating a class of composition of activity of which it is a member.
The relationship 'start up for daily operation on 2001-10-22' between:
the individual activity 'Much Binding B operation on 2001-10-22'; and
the individual activity 'Much Binding B daily start-up on 2001-10-22',
that indicates the operation activity contained a start-up activity, is a composition_of_individual_activity.
a relationship between one individual activity and another that indicates one is part of the other.
class of composition of activity; Class of composition of activity is within the scope of the Class_of_composition_of_activity application module.
classification of a whole-part relationship between activities; Classification of composition of activity is within the scope of the Activity_structure_and_classification application module.
The Composition_of_individual_activity UoF identifies a composition of individual activity and defines the individual activities for the whole and part.
